compatibility.notes: The LOOP license is designed to be permissive and compatible with a wide range of other licenses, particularly those that are also permissive. Care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Maintain copyright notices and permission notices in all copies and documentation.
Provide the software 'as is' without warranty.
license.name: LOOP
obligations: Include the M.I.T. copyright notice in all copies.
Include the permission notice in supporting documentation.
Do not use the names 'M.I.T.' or 'Massachusetts Institute of Technology' in advertising or publicity without permission.
Include notice in supporting documentation that distribution is by permission of M.I.T.
Include the Symbolics copyright notice in all copies.
Include the permission notice in supporting documentation for Symbolics.
Do not use the name 'Symbolics' in advertising or publicity without permission.
Include notice in supporting documentation that distribution is by permission of Symbolics.
